Title: Verify the cart page after user added product to the cart
Prerequisites:
Site url : https://www.saucedemo.com/

Product is added to the cart
Username: standard_user
Password: secret_sauce
Steps:
1. Click on cart icon from the top
2. Verify the cart page details
ExpectedResult:
1. Cart page will be displayed
2. Added product should be displayed with quantity, price and Remove button. Also, Continue Shopping and Checkout button should be displayed

Title: Verify that user clicks on Cancelling the order from Checkout page
Prerequisites:
Site url : https://www.saucedemo.com/

Registered user is signed in
Product is added to the user
User is on checkout page
Username: standard_user
Password: secret_sauce
Steps:
1. Enter the user information
2. Click on Continue button
3. Click on Cancel button
ExpectedResult:
1. Fill the First Name, Last Name, Zip/Postal Code fields
2. Checkout: Overview will be displayed
3. Return to Home page and product in the cart should not be removed.

Title: Verify the login page when locked out user trys to login
Prerequisites:
Site url : https://www.saucedemo.com/

Username: locked_out_user
password: secret_sauce
Steps:
1. Launch Sauce Labs site in any browser
2. Enter locked out user credentials in the login page
3. Click on Login button
ExpectedResult:
1. Sauce labs login page will be displayed
3. "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out." error message should be displayed.
